info.title: OBSOLIO API Documentation
info.description:
# OBSOLIO API - Organized Endpoint Structure

This API provides a clear separation between different user contexts:

## Endpoint Organization

### Public Endpoints
- `/auth/*` - Authentication and registration
- `/marketplace/*` - Public marketplace for browsing agents
- `/subscription-plans` - Pricing information

### Admin Endpoints (System Console)
- `/admin/*` - System administration operations
  - Tenant management
  - User management
  - Agent management (global)
  - Analytics and reports
  - Audit logs

### Tenant Endpoints (Dashboard)
- `/tenant/*` - Tenant-specific operations
  - Profile and settings
  - Dashboard and statistics
  - Organizations
  - Agents (installed)
  - Subscriptions and billing
  - Activities and sessions

### Webhooks
- `/webhooks/*` - External callback endpoints

## Authentication

Most endpoints require JWT Bearer token authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:

```
Authorization: Bearer <your-jwt-token>
```

Public endpoints (auth, marketplace) do not require authentication.

get.description: Get all agent categories ordered by display_order with agents count

delete.description: Delete an agent category (only if no agents exist in category)

get.description: Get all agent endpoints with filters

post.description: Create a new agent endpoint (trigger or callback)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific agent endpoint
Get paginated list of all agent execution history with filters

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific organization

Reactivate a deactivated organization by reactivating its tenant

get.description: Get statistics about all organizations
Get paginated list of all subscription instances with filters

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific subscription

get.summary: List all tenants with filtering and pagination

get.description: Get all subscription plans with optional filters

delete.description: Delete a subscription plan (only if no active subscriptions)

get.description: Get paginated list of agent execution history for the current tenant with optional filters

post.description: Initiates asynchronous execution of an agent. The agent will process the request in the background and send results to the callback webhook.

input.description: Input parameters for the agent execution

400.description: Agent is not active or no trigger endpoint configured

500.description: Agent failed to accept execution or internal error

get.description: Retrieve the status and results of an agent execution run

example.result: The weather in Cairo is sunny, 28C

post.description: Webhook endpoint for agents to send execution results. This endpoint does not require JWT authentication but validates a secret token instead.

example.result: The weather in Cairo is sunny, 28C

message.example: No active callback endpoint configured for this agent

subdomain.description: Required for ALL types. Unique workspace URL identifier.

post.summary: Check if a subdomain is available

get.summary: Check if a subdomain is available (GET)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific agent in the marketplace
Display a listing of organizations.

parameters.description: Filter by status (active, invited, suspended, left)

Unauthorized.description: Unauthenticated - Invalid or missing JWT token

bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer {token}
